metadata.title: CVE-2018-16976 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Gitolite before 3.6.9 does not (in certain configurations involving @all or a regex) properly restrict access to a Git repository that is in the process of being migrated until the full set of migration steps has been completed. This can allow valid users to obtain unintended access.

criterions.comment: gitolite3 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
